text: Lokomotiv () is a professional association football club from Plovdiv, Bulgaria. The team plays in the First Professional Football League. The team's home stadium is Lokomotiv Stadium. The club was founded on 25 July 1926. The club is one of the best supported clubs in Bulgaria. The club's biggest rival is Botev Plovdiv. The club's nicknames are Smarfovete (The Smurfs) and Zheleznicharite (The Railwaymen). == Titles == Bulgarian A Group: * Winners (1): 2003–04 * Runners-up (1): 1972–73 Bulgarian Cup: * Runners-up (4 [7†]): 1960, 1971, 1982, 2012; [1940 (as Sportclub), 1942 (as Sportclub), 1948 (as Slaviya-Chengelov)] Cup of the Soviet Army * Winners (1): 1983 Bulgarian Supercup: * Winners (1): 2004 * Runners-up (1): 2012 == References == == Other websites == * * Official fan-website * Historical fan-website Category:1926 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in Bulgaria Category:Bulgarian football clubs
title: PFC Lokomotiv Plovdiv
